title: Does anyone recognises these fonts??
content:
Hey guys,  
Does anyone recognise these fonts at all? Having trouble IDing any of them.  
Thanks!

PS. Apologies for the screen shots!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image1.png) | 22.2 KB |
| [image2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image2.png) | 16.93 KB |
| [image3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image3.png) | 10.65 KB |
| [image4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image4.png) | 20.24 KB |
| [image5.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image5.png) | 14.9 KB |
| [image6.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image6.png) | 9.92 KB |
| [image7.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/typophile.com/files/image7.png) | 16.08 KB |
author: _Ashleigh

comments.content:
image1 and image2: [La Portenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/la-portenia) De La Boca  
image6 and image7: [Sacramento](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Sacramento)  
image5: only alternatives [The Fighter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/kg-the-fighter), [Prelude](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.dafont.com/preludeflf.font), [Discipuli Britannica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.dafont.com/discipuli-britannica.font)

Hello  
Image1 and image 2:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/La-Portenia-De-La-Boca-sudtipos.font?text=wedd...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.whatfontis.com/La-Portenia-De-La-Boca-sudtipos.font?text=wedding%20lovelies "http://www.whatfontis.com/La-Portenia-De-La-Boca-sudtipos.font?text=wedding%20lovelies")  
Image 3 and image 4:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Shelby-laura-worthington.font?text=get%20the%2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Shelby-laura-worthington.font?text=get%20the%20look%20Jamie%20Mears "http://www.whatfontis.com/Shelby-laura-worthington.font?text=get%20the%20look%20Jamie%20Mears")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420162717/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
